Name: cafe BUHRS
Review Text:

Name: cafe BUHRS
Review Text: Drinks were refreshing and delicious! The staff were very attentive, kind and welcoming! Will definitely go again!

Name: cafe BUHRS
Review Text: Lovely cafe located in one of my favorite places in Amsterdam. Altogether its a cafe their selection of beers is lovely. Great place to go with friends at happy hour or dinner with your loved one. I loved the french fries with beer. Will come back for sure.

Name: cafe BUHRS
Review Text:
Great place to chill, nice atmosphere inside and outside. They give a good service.
Go there!

Name: cafe BUHRS
Review Text: Great service, nice beer and lovely seat in the shade on a hot day. Were able to watch the football match on the big screen!

Name: cafe BUHRS
Review Text: Very cosy and far from the traffic and turists. Recommended if you want to escape a bit from the noisy and busy city center.

Name: cafe BUHRS
Review Text: My favourite,  little local pub in Amsterdam,  such a gorgeous,  friendly,  fun vibe with the nicest people,  (Mo, Kitty and Teddy), you're likely to meet.  Miss you guys,  hope to get back soon. x
